mapper.select: select id, addtime, yonghuzhanghao, yonghuxingming, mima, xingbie, nianling, lianxidianhua, dianziyouxiang, shenfenzhenghao, jiatingdizhi from yonghu where id = #{id}
select id, addtime, yonghuzhanghao, yonghuxingming, mima, xingbie, nianling, lianxidianhua, dianziyouxiang, shenfenzhenghao, jiatingdizhi from yonghu where yonghuzhanghao = #{openid}
mapper.insert: insert into yonghu(addtime, yonghuzhanghao, yonghuxingming, mima, xingbie, nianling, lianxidianhua, dianziyouxiang, shenfenzhenghao, jiatingdizhi) values (#{addtime}, #{yonghuzhanghao}, #{yonghuxingming}, #{mima}, #{xingbie}, #{nianling}, #{lianxidianhua}, #{dianziyouxiang}, #{shenfenzhenghao}, #{jiatingdizhi})

insert into yonghu(addtime, yonghuzhanghao, yonghuxingming, mima, xingbie, nianling, lianxidianhua, dianziyouxiang, shenfenzhenghao, jiatingdizhi) values
(#{entity.addtime}, #{entity.yonghuzhanghao}, #{entity.yonghuxingming}, #{entity.mima}, #{entity.xingbie}, #{entity.nianling}, #{entity.lianxidianhua}, #{entity.dianziyouxiang}, #{entity.shenfenzhenghao}, #{entity.jiatingdizhi})

insert into yonghu(addtime, yonghuzhanghao, yonghuxingming, mima, xingbie, nianling, lianxidianhua, dianziyouxiang, shenfenzhenghao, jiatingdizhi) values
(#{entity.addtime}, #{entity.yonghuzhanghao}, #{entity.yonghuxingming}, #{entity.mima}, #{entity.xingbie}, #{entity.nianling}, #{entity.lianxidianhua}, #{entity.dianziyouxiang}, #{entity.shenfenzhenghao}, #{entity.jiatingdizhi})
on duplicate key update addtime = values(addtime), yonghuzhanghao = values(yonghuzhanghao), yonghuxingming = values(yonghuxingming), mima = values(mima), xingbie = values(xingbie), nianling = values(nianling), lianxidianhua = values(lianxidianhua), dianziyouxiang = values(dianziyouxiang), shenfenzhenghao = values(shenfenzhenghao), jiatingdizhi = values(jiatingdizhi)
mapper.update:
update yonghu
addtime = #{addtime},
yonghuzhanghao = #{yonghuzhanghao},
yonghuxingming = #{yonghuxingming},
mima = #{mima},
xingbie = #{xingbie},
nianling = #{nianling},
lianxidianhua = #{lianxidianhua},
dianziyouxiang = #{dianziyouxiang},
shenfenzhenghao = #{shenfenzhenghao},
jiatingdizhi = #{jiatingdizhi},
where id = #{id}

update yonghu
addtime = #{addtime},
yonghuxingming = #{yonghuxingming},
mima = #{mima},
xingbie = #{xingbie},
nianling = #{nianling},
lianxidianhua = #{lianxidianhua},
dianziyouxiang = #{dianziyouxiang},
shenfenzhenghao = #{shenfenzhenghao},
jiatingdizhi = #{jiatingdizhi},
where yonghuzhanghao = #{yonghuzhanghao}
